channel.title: talks on Carlo Cavicchia
channel.description: Recent content in talks on Carlo Cavicchia

item.title: seminars and talks
item.description: invited seminar Hierarchical Disjoint Nonnegative Factor Analysis - EconJobMarket (2019, Erasmus University Rotterdam - Rotterdam, The Netherlands) invited talks A composite indicator via hierarchical disjoint factor analysis for measuring the Italian football teams’ performances - Scientific Conference on Statistics for Healt and Well-Being (ASA) (2019, Brescia, Italy) Dimensionality Reduction via Hierarchical Factorial Structure - 12nd Scientific Meeting of Classification and Data Analysis Group (CLADAG) (2019 - Cassino, Italy) The systemic view of the SDGs indicators through a statistical model-based approach: an application on Eu countries - 49th Scientific meeting of the Italian Statistical Society (SIS) (2018 - Palermo, Italy) Workshop “Selection and Synthesis of Indicators for Sustainable Development Goals: Methodologies and Applications”” (2017 - Rome, Italy) contributed talks and/or co-authorships A parsimonious parameterization of a nonnegative correlation matrix - Workshop on Models and Learning for Clustering and Classification (2020 - Catania, Italy - Virtual) Model-based hierarchical parsimonious clustering and dimensionality reduction - 16th Conference of the Internation Federation of Classification Societies (IFCS) (2019 - Thessaloniki, Greece - Co-author) Hierarchical Disjoint Non-Negative Factor Analysis: environment and waste management in the EU - Innovation and Society (IES) (2019 - Rome, Italy) A new hierarchical model-based composite indicator on climate change - Innovation and Society (IES) (2019 - Rome, Italy - Co-author) Hierarchical Disjoint Principal Component Analysis - European Conference on Data Analysis (ECDA) (2019, Bayreuth, Germany - Co-author) Model-based double hierarchical parsimonious clustering - 4th International Workshop on Model-Based Clustering and Classification (2018 - Catania, Italy - Co-author) Model-based Synthesis for SDGs Indicators - Annual meeting AIQUAV (2017 - Florence, Italy)
